nodes.bodyText: Normally, a range would be specified so that the start sorts before the end, but 's' sorts after 'e'. You should change it to match myRow and myRow~ like the previous line, instead, so that way this will still work, even if we later add additional argument checks to make sure the start sorts before the end.
Funny thing is, that is actually what I had originally but I changed it to mimic the parameters names for whatever reason.
